title: Managing Neuroleptic Malignant Syndrome: An Evidence-Based Update
itunes:title: Managing Neuroleptic Malignant Syndrome: An Evidence-Based Update
description:
How should we approach the management of neuroleptic malignant syndrome? What is the role of bromocriptine, dantrolene, and ECT?

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 23
  • The Neuroleptic Malignant Syndrome—A Systematic Case Series Analysis Focusing on Therapy Regimes and Outcome
